name: groupomania-back-end
description: VERBS:        URI:                 BODY:                            RESPONSES: POST       auth/signup     {email:string, password}             {message:string} POST       auth/login      {email:string, password}             {userId:string, token:string} GET        sauces/                   -                          [toutes les sauces] GET        sauces/{id}                -                          sauce POST       sauces/         {sauce:string, image:file}           {message:string}Verb PUT        sauces/{id}      JSON{sauce:string, image:file}       {message:string}
